name: TOWER JOIN
description:
Inspired by Tower of Hanoi, TOWER JOIN is a puzzle game in which the player must move colored pieces, that are stacked onto pegs, to carefully combine them in the correct order.

How to Play
  • Click on a piece to move it to another peg. A piece can only be moved if there are no other pieces above it.
  • Pieces that have the same color, and that have connecting symbols, will be joined into one.
  • Once joined, the pieces must always be moved together.
  • Join all the pieces in the level to complete it.
